mapper.select: select id, isUsed, create_time, update_time, remarks, a_name, a_head, a_type, province, city, area, school from c_authors where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into c_authors(isUsed, create_time, update_time, remarks, a_name, a_head, a_type, province, city, area, school) values (#{isused}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{remarks}, #{aName}, #{aHead}, #{aType}, #{province}, #{city}, #{area}, #{school})

insert into c_authors(isUsed, create_time, update_time, remarks, a_name, a_head, a_type, province, city, area, school) values
(#{entity.isused}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.remarks}, #{entity.aName}, #{entity.aHead}, #{entity.aType}, #{entity.province}, #{entity.city}, #{entity.area}, #{entity.school})

insert into c_authors(isUsed, create_time, update_time, remarks, a_name, a_head, a_type, province, city, area, school) values
(#{entity.isused}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.remarks}, #{entity.aName}, #{entity.aHead}, #{entity.aType}, #{entity.province}, #{entity.city}, #{entity.area}, #{entity.school})
on duplicate key update isUsed = values(isUsed), create_time = values(create_time), update_time = values(update_time), remarks = values(remarks), a_name = values(a_name), a_head = values(a_head), a_type = values(a_type), province = values(province), city = values(city), area = values(area), school = values(school)
mapper.update:
update c_authors
isUsed = #{isused},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
remarks = #{remarks},
a_name = #{aName},
a_head = #{aHead},
a_type = #{aType},
province = #{province},
city = #{city},
area = #{area},
school = #{school},
where id = #{id}
